{{ddcl|since=c++26|header=experimental/execution|

execution::sender auto just(
    auto ...&amp;&amp; values
);
}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|values|input values which are decay-copied into the returned sender.}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Returns a sender with no completion schedulers, which sends the provided values.
